GeneName	COX19
Length	90
Function	Required for the transduction of an SCO1-dependent redox signal from the mitochondrion to ATP7A to regulate cellular copper homeostasis (PubMed:23345593). May be required for the assembly of mitochondrial cytochrome c oxidase (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytosol; Mitochondrion intermembrane space; Mitochondrion
